[Steps for successful frontend cloud adoption]{br="«R4qkvffblslfb»"
brr="1"
style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;text-decoration:inherit;text-wrap:balance"}

[A practical guide to implementation tactics, potential roadblocks, and

::::::::::::: {.stack_stack__iZkUS .stack .article-page_content__OLc9X role="main" data-version="v1" style="--stack-flex:initial;--stack-direction:column;--stack-align:stretch;--stack-justify:flex-start;--stack-padding:0px;--stack-gap:0px"}
::: article-page_text__Sf989
## []{#introduction .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Introduction](#introduction){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#introduction .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

A frontend cloud is a suite of cloud-native tools---like global
infrastructure and caching, observability, and workflow
tooling---designed to help companies and developers deliver the best web
experience for their users. 

This toolkit addresses the unique requirements of frontend developers,
providing a comprehensive suite of tools and services designed to
facilitate the development, testing, and deployment of high-quality web
applications. It offers a wide range of benefits for organizations
seeking to optimize their web development processes, improve time to
market, and deliver engaging user experiences. 

From Netflix to Traeger Grills, these unique advantages are spurring
high-performing enterprise engineering teams to adopt a frontend cloud. 

This whitepaper will outline the process an organization may follow for
frontend cloud adoption, followed by potential roadblocks and suggested
ROI measurements.

## []{#6-steps-for-frontend-cloud-adoption .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[6 steps for frontend cloud adoption](#6-steps-for-frontend-cloud-adoption){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#steps-for-frontend-cloud-adoption .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

Implementing a frontend cloud requires careful planning, evaluation, and
collaboration across the organization. Here are six practical steps your
business can take for better developer and user experience via your
frontend cloud:

### []{#1.-assess-your-current-frontend-infrastructure-and-workflows .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[1. Assess your current frontend infrastructure and workflows](#1.-assess-your-current-frontend-infrastructure-and-workflows){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#assess-your-current-frontend-infrastructure-and-workflows .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Identify areas for improvement in your existing frontend development and
deployment processes.

<figure class="relative my-[var(--geist-gap)] lg:my-10"
data-vercel-edit-target="true">

### []{#2.-define-your-goals-and-requirements .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[2. Define your goals and requirements](#2.-define-your-goals-and-requirements){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#define-your-goals-and-requirements .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Establish clear objectives for adopting a frontend cloud.

<figure class="relative my-[var(--geist-gap)] lg:my-10"
data-vercel-edit-target="true">

### []{#3.-evaluate-frontend-cloud-providers .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[3. Evaluate frontend cloud providers](#3.-evaluate-frontend-cloud-providers){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#evaluate-frontend-cloud-providers .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Find the one that best aligns with your organization\'s goals and
requirements.

<figure class="relative my-[var(--geist-gap)] lg:my-10"
data-vercel-edit-target="true">

### []{#4.-develop-a-migration-plan .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[4. Develop a migration plan](#4.-develop-a-migration-plan){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#develop-a-migration-plan .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Outline the necessary steps for migrating your existing frontend assets
and infrastructure to the chosen frontend cloud platform.

### []{#5.-train-your-team .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[5. Train your team](#5.-train-your-team){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#train-your-team .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Ensure that developers and other stakeholders are well-versed in the new
tools, technologies, and workflows associated with the frontend cloud.

Choose a frontend cloud solution that has a robust offering of:

- **Documentation**: Comprehensive documentation and tutorials to help
  developers get started with the platform, covering topics such as
  deployment, performance optimization, and security.
- **Training and support**: Online training and support resources,
  including forums, Slack communities, and customer support, to help
  developers and stakeholders learn and troubleshoot any issues they
  encounter.
- **Integrations**: Integrates with other developer tools and services,
  such as CMS or commerce tool of choice, your Git provider of choice,
  and any observability or monitoring tools to streamline workflows and
  reduce the learning curve associated with adopting a new platform.
- **Community resources:** A strong and active community of developers
  who contribute to open-source projects, share best practices, and
  provide peer support through online forums and social media.
- **Enterprise support:** For enterprise customers, additional services
  such as dedicated support, training, and customized onboarding to
  ensure a smooth transition to the new tools and workflows.

### []{#-6.-monitor-progress-and-iterate .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [6. Monitor progress and iterate](#-6.-monitor-progress-and-iterate){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#monitor-progress-and-iterate .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Continuously assess the effectiveness of your frontend cloud adoption,
making adjustments as needed to optimize outcomes and achieve your
desired goals.

## []{#--overcoming-challenges-and-potential-roadblocks .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [Overcoming challenges and potential roadblocks](#--overcoming-challenges-and-potential-roadblocks){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#overcoming-challenges-and-potential-roadblocks .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

For a smooth tech stack transition, it's important to address potential
challenges proactively. Here are some anticipated roadblocks that your
team may address in advance of your frontend cloud journey:

### []{#-addressing-concerns-about-vendor-lock-in .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [Addressing concerns about vendor lock-in](#-addressing-concerns-about-vendor-lock-in){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#addressing-concerns-about-vendor-lock-in .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Choose a frontend cloud provider with a strong commitment to open
standards and interoperability, minimizing the risk of being locked into
a single platform.

### []{#managing-change-resistance .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Managing change resistance](#managing-change-resistance){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#managing-change-resistance .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Communicate the benefits of adopting a frontend cloud to your team and
involve them in the decision-making process to foster buy-in and
minimize resistance to change. Gather stakeholders early, and start with
an incremental migration (a subset of pages, or a single team) to prove
out your solution.

### []{#ensuring-security-and-compliance .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Ensuring security and compliance](#ensuring-security-and-compliance){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#ensuring-security-and-compliance .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Leverage the built-in security features of your frontend cloud provider
and stay up-to-date on industry best practices to maintain a secure and
compliant frontend environment.

### []{#scaling-your-frontend-cloud-adoption .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Scaling your frontend cloud adoption](#scaling-your-frontend-cloud-adoption){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#scaling-your-frontend-cloud-adoption .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Plan for growth by selecting a provider that offers flexible, scalable
solutions that can adapt to your organization\'s evolving needs.

## []{#--measuring-the-impact-and-roi-of-a-frontend-cloud-implementation-- .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [Measuring the impact and ROI of a frontend cloud implementation](#--measuring-the-impact-and-roi-of-a-frontend-cloud-implementation--){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5} [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#measuring-the-impact-and-roi-of-a-frontend-cloud-implementation .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

High-performing enterprise teams are reaping the benefits of their
frontend clouds. What kind of return on investment will your team see?
Get your dashboards ready---here are some categories you can measure
upon implementation:

### []{#deployment-frequency .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Deployment frequency](#deployment-frequency){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#deployment-frequency .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The number of deployments to the frontend cloud platform over a given
period of time, indicating the agility and speed of the development
process.

### []{#time-to-market .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Time to market](#time-to-market){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#time-to-market .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The time it takes to develop and release new features or updates to the
frontend, indicating the speed and efficiency of the development
process.

### []{#availability .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Availability](#availability){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#availability .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The percentage of time that the frontend cloud platform is available and
responsive to users, indicating the reliability and uptime of the
platform.

### []{#page-load-time .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Page load time](#page-load-time){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#page-load-time .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The time it takes for a page to load on the frontend, indicating the
performance and user experience of the platform.

### []{#user-engagement .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[User engagement](#user-engagement){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#user-engagement .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Metrics such as click-through rates, bounce rates, and user retention
can provide insight into how users are engaging with the frontend and
whether it is meeting their needs.

### []{#cost-savings .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Cost savings](#cost-savings){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#cost-savings .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The reduction in infrastructure and maintenance costs compared to
on-premise hosting or other hosting options, indicating the ROI of
adopting a frontend cloud platform.

### []{#developer-productivity-and-onboarding .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Developer productivity and onboarding](#developer-productivity-and-onboarding){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#developer-productivity-and-onboarding .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Metrics such as code quality and developer satisfaction can provide
insight into the efficiency and effectiveness of the development
process. Additionally, you can track the length of time for contractor
and new hire onboarding.

## []{#---conclusion-- .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [Conclusion](#---conclusion--){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5} [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#conclusion .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

Implementing a frontend cloud requires careful planning, evaluation, and
collaboration across the organization, but the long-term benefits in
terms of efficiency, scalability, and adaptability are well worth the
effort. By following the strategies outlined in this whitepaper,
organizations can successfully navigate the adoption process and fully
harness the power of the frontend cloud to propel their digital
transformation journey.
:::

::::::::::::: {.stack_stack__iZkUS .stack .article-page_content__OLc9X role="main" data-version="v1" style="--stack-flex:initial;--stack-direction:column;--stack-align:stretch;--stack-justify:flex-start;--stack-padding:0px;--stack-gap:0px"}
::: article-page_text__Sf989
## []{#introduction .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Introduction](#introduction){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#introduction .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

A frontend cloud is a suite of cloud-native tools---like global
infrastructure and caching, observability, and workflow
tooling---designed to help companies and developers deliver the best web
experience for their users. 

This toolkit addresses the unique requirements of frontend developers,
providing a comprehensive suite of tools and services designed to
facilitate the development, testing, and deployment of high-quality web
applications. It offers a wide range of benefits for organizations
seeking to optimize their web development processes, improve time to
market, and deliver engaging user experiences. 

From Netflix to Traeger Grills, these unique advantages are spurring
high-performing enterprise engineering teams to adopt a frontend cloud. 

This whitepaper will outline the process an organization may follow for
frontend cloud adoption, followed by potential roadblocks and suggested
ROI measurements.

## []{#6-steps-for-frontend-cloud-adoption .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[6 steps for frontend cloud adoption](#6-steps-for-frontend-cloud-adoption){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#steps-for-frontend-cloud-adoption .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

Implementing a frontend cloud requires careful planning, evaluation, and
collaboration across the organization. Here are six practical steps your
business can take for better developer and user experience via your
frontend cloud:

### []{#1.-assess-your-current-frontend-infrastructure-and-workflows .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[1. Assess your current frontend infrastructure and workflows](#1.-assess-your-current-frontend-infrastructure-and-workflows){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#assess-your-current-frontend-infrastructure-and-workflows .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Identify areas for improvement in your existing frontend development and
deployment processes.

<figure class="relative my-[var(--geist-gap)] lg:my-10"
data-vercel-edit-target="true">
<div
class="bg-[var(--geist-background)] max-w-full mx-auto overflow-hidden rounded-[var(--geist-radius)] flex justify-center"

### []{#2.-define-your-goals-and-requirements .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[2. Define your goals and requirements](#2.-define-your-goals-and-requirements){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#define-your-goals-and-requirements .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Establish clear objectives for adopting a frontend cloud.

<figure class="relative my-[var(--geist-gap)] lg:my-10"
data-vercel-edit-target="true">
<div
class="bg-[var(--geist-background)] max-w-full mx-auto overflow-hidden rounded-[var(--geist-radius)] flex justify-center"

width="752" height="833" alt="Group 513692 (2).png" />

### []{#3.-evaluate-frontend-cloud-providers .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[3. Evaluate frontend cloud providers](#3.-evaluate-frontend-cloud-providers){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#evaluate-frontend-cloud-providers .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Find the one that best aligns with your organization\'s goals and
requirements.

<figure class="relative my-[var(--geist-gap)] lg:my-10"
data-vercel-edit-target="true">
<div
class="bg-[var(--geist-background)] max-w-full mx-auto overflow-hidden rounded-[var(--geist-radius)] flex justify-center"

src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fe5382hct74si%2F5twd1ffB8zs7DUG9TL737L%2F42176c280c7687941e4d7e2475a905de%2FGroup_513699.png&amp;w=1920&amp;q=75"
class="image_intrinsic__ulrJk" style="color:transparent"
data-version="v1" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-nimg="1"
srcset="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fe5382hct74si%2F5twd1ffB8zs7DUG9TL737L%2F42176c280c7687941e4d7e2475a905de%2FGroup_513699.png&amp;w=828&amp;q=75 1x, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fe5382hct74si%2F5twd1ffB8zs7DUG9TL737L%2F42176c280c7687941e4d7e2475a905de%2FGroup_513699.png&amp;w=1920&amp;q=75 2x"
width="752" height="1034" alt="Group 513699.png" />

### []{#4.-develop-a-migration-plan .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[4. Develop a migration plan](#4.-develop-a-migration-plan){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#develop-a-migration-plan .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Outline the necessary steps for migrating your existing frontend assets
and infrastructure to the chosen frontend cloud platform.

### []{#5.-train-your-team .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[5. Train your team](#5.-train-your-team){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#train-your-team .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Ensure that developers and other stakeholders are well-versed in the new
tools, technologies, and workflows associated with the frontend cloud.

Choose a frontend cloud solution that has a robust offering of:

- **Documentation**: Comprehensive documentation and tutorials to help
  developers get started with the platform, covering topics such as
  deployment, performance optimization, and security.
- **Training and support**: Online training and support resources,
  including forums, Slack communities, and customer support, to help
  developers and stakeholders learn and troubleshoot any issues they
  encounter.
- **Integrations**: Integrates with other developer tools and services,
  such as CMS or commerce tool of choice, your Git provider of choice,
  and any observability or monitoring tools to streamline workflows and
  reduce the learning curve associated with adopting a new platform.
- **Community resources:** A strong and active community of developers
  who contribute to open-source projects, share best practices, and
  provide peer support through online forums and social media.
- **Enterprise support:** For enterprise customers, additional services
  such as dedicated support, training, and customized onboarding to
  ensure a smooth transition to the new tools and workflows.

### []{#-6.-monitor-progress-and-iterate .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [6. Monitor progress and iterate](#-6.-monitor-progress-and-iterate){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#monitor-progress-and-iterate .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Continuously assess the effectiveness of your frontend cloud adoption,
making adjustments as needed to optimize outcomes and achieve your
desired goals.

## []{#--overcoming-challenges-and-potential-roadblocks .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [Overcoming challenges and potential roadblocks](#--overcoming-challenges-and-potential-roadblocks){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#overcoming-challenges-and-potential-roadblocks .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

For a smooth tech stack transition, it's important to address potential
challenges proactively. Here are some anticipated roadblocks that your
team may address in advance of your frontend cloud journey:

### []{#-addressing-concerns-about-vendor-lock-in .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [Addressing concerns about vendor lock-in](#-addressing-concerns-about-vendor-lock-in){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#addressing-concerns-about-vendor-lock-in .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Choose a frontend cloud provider with a strong commitment to open
standards and interoperability, minimizing the risk of being locked into
a single platform.

### []{#managing-change-resistance .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Managing change resistance](#managing-change-resistance){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#managing-change-resistance .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Communicate the benefits of adopting a frontend cloud to your team and
involve them in the decision-making process to foster buy-in and
minimize resistance to change. Gather stakeholders early, and start with
an incremental migration (a subset of pages, or a single team) to prove
out your solution.

### []{#ensuring-security-and-compliance .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Ensuring security and compliance](#ensuring-security-and-compliance){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#ensuring-security-and-compliance .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Leverage the built-in security features of your frontend cloud provider
and stay up-to-date on industry best practices to maintain a secure and
compliant frontend environment.

### []{#scaling-your-frontend-cloud-adoption .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Scaling your frontend cloud adoption](#scaling-your-frontend-cloud-adoption){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#scaling-your-frontend-cloud-adoption .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Plan for growth by selecting a provider that offers flexible, scalable
solutions that can adapt to your organization\'s evolving needs.

## []{#--measuring-the-impact-and-roi-of-a-frontend-cloud-implementation-- .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [Measuring the impact and ROI of a frontend cloud implementation](#--measuring-the-impact-and-roi-of-a-frontend-cloud-implementation--){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5} [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#measuring-the-impact-and-roi-of-a-frontend-cloud-implementation .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

High-performing enterprise teams are reaping the benefits of their
frontend clouds. What kind of return on investment will your team see?
Get your dashboards ready---here are some categories you can measure
upon implementation:

### []{#deployment-frequency .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Deployment frequency](#deployment-frequency){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#deployment-frequency .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The number of deployments to the frontend cloud platform over a given
period of time, indicating the agility and speed of the development
process.

### []{#time-to-market .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Time to market](#time-to-market){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#time-to-market .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The time it takes to develop and release new features or updates to the
frontend, indicating the speed and efficiency of the development
process.

### []{#availability .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Availability](#availability){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#availability .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The percentage of time that the frontend cloud platform is available and
responsive to users, indicating the reliability and uptime of the
platform.

### []{#page-load-time .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Page load time](#page-load-time){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#page-load-time .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The time it takes for a page to load on the frontend, indicating the
performance and user experience of the platform.

### []{#user-engagement .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[User engagement](#user-engagement){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#user-engagement .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Metrics such as click-through rates, bounce rates, and user retention
can provide insight into how users are engaging with the frontend and
whether it is meeting their needs.

### []{#cost-savings .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Cost savings](#cost-savings){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#cost-savings .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

The reduction in infrastructure and maintenance costs compared to
on-premise hosting or other hosting options, indicating the ROI of
adopting a frontend cloud platform.

### []{#developer-productivity-and-onboarding .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute}[Developer productivity and onboarding](#developer-productivity-and-onboarding){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5}[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#developer-productivity-and-onboarding .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-8 .text-xl .leading-6 .tracking-[-0.01rem] .lg:text-2xl .lg:leading-8 .lg:mt-9 .heading3}

Metrics such as code quality and developer satisfaction can provide
insight into the efficiency and effectiveness of the development
process. Additionally, you can track the length of time for contractor
and new hire onboarding.

## []{#---conclusion-- .block .-mt-5 .pt-5 .invisible .absolute} [Conclusion](#---conclusion--){.border-b .border-transparent .text-inherit .no-underline .hover:border-b-current .inline-block .lg:mr-2.5} [![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]{.text-center .align-middle .border .invisible .hidden .lg:inline-block .group-hover-visible} {#conclusion .group .flex .items-baseline .mt-[52px] .mb-6 .tracking-[-0.03rem] .leading-7 .lg:mt-[60px] .lg:text-[2rem] .lg:leading-9 .heading2}

Implementing a frontend cloud requires careful planning, evaluation, and
collaboration across the organization, but the long-term benefits in
terms of efficiency, scalability, and adaptability are well worth the
effort. By following the strategies outlined in this whitepaper,
organizations can successfully navigate the adoption process and fully
harness the power of the frontend cloud to propel their digital
transformation journey.
:::
